review: It is very easy to install from my Apple Tablet and my Sony Android Tablet (4.0.3 Ice Cream Sandwich) to Sony Bravia TV.Currently the number of programs that are available is very limited, however I am confident that Google will add move.For the price how can you go wrong?
author: JKX4009

review: What I like in Google Chromecast HDMI Streaming Media Player, that you don't only stream movies and showes from Netflix, Youtub etc. but you transform your computer or laptop screen to a big TV screen. Installation is very easy (if I can install it, everybody can do it). No wiers or connection cables between the tv and the computer. You can evan use your phone. Good quality of streamed pictures, with very short delay of streaming between the computer and the tv screen, In general... I love it.

review: If you are not a Netflix subscriber, Google Chromecast will be valuable to you only for YouTube or (perhaps) some local computing tasks. Still, it is way ahead of anything in its price category. Apple TV is superior, but it's a lot more money, too. If you are interested in the Chrome environment, you'll like Chromecast.
author: rpb "There ain't nothin' like a good book!"

review: The quality of the video is amazing. I played youtube in Chrome browser from a windows laptop onto the TV.One problem, a major one, is that if you are in a hotel where you connect to internet via  browser (by giving guest user id and password and by accepting the terms and conditions) as against just giving the password (WPA Security key) on your home router, the Chromecast doesn't work.The Chromecast doesn't give you an option where you can enter the guest user id and password on a browser page. It always expects that you are connecting to a 'home' type of router and asks just for the router password.This is a major disappointment.
